title: BookList
description: A list of book metadata objects used by SparkReader Library.

tags.description: Comma-separated list of classification tags. Valid tags are defined in tags.txt: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/sparkreaderapp/sparkreader-library/main/catalog/tags.txt

description.description: Short description or abstract of the book

file.description: Relative path to the plain text file within the released library.zip

source.description: Origin or publisher of the text

source_link.description: Canonical URL of the original source
